text: Olwalelo mufuchililwa ebilayi biosi. Ne ebiakhulia bia balia bahebwa eshitabu bifuchililwa khwinywe, ne ebilibwa bienyu bifuchililwa khubo. Ne mufuchililwa okhuteshia Abakhasi abalayi mubasuubili nende Abakhasi abalayi mubalia abahebwa eshitabu, nimwakhabahelesia omurungo kwabu, mwa boya ninabo nikka, obulakhola ninabo obwilasi nohomba okhubabikha tawe. Ne uloba okhusuubila toto oyo ebikhole bibie biakora naye mwikulu aliba mubandu abasikha
